item.description:
We will have Mark Forss, Director of EAA SportAir Workshops, give a talk on what's involved with kitbuilding. He will take us through the entire building process, discuss the relevant FAA rules (in plain English) and dispel some of the common misconceptions involved in building your own aircraft. It should be a very interesting night!

Areas of discussion consist of the following:

  • Introduction
  • Planning
  • Selecting
  • Building
  • Completion
  • Flight Testing
  • Operating
  • Resources

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley
